resources.string:
Introduction

THIS APPLICATION ACTUALLY SAVES THE DELETED MESSAGES FROM NOTIFICATION OF whatsapp and ou can read the messages that are deleted by the other person chatting with you. We also facilitate you with status downloader for whatsapp.

Ads implementation:

we are using admob for the interstitials and banners in this application

Graphics and ASO:

WE ARE PURELY HAVING OUR OWN GRAPHICS AND DESCRIPTION.

PERMISSION:

 **NOTIFICATION LISTENER **
 **READ PHONE STORAGE**
 **WRITE PHONE STORAGE**
Note: - The app is neither affiliated to any other app nor claims to own a trademark to use the name and logo of any third party app.\n
